item.title: Using Terraform Providers: Dodging Default Behaviour
item.description: Contents Intro Providers: what are they? The easiest way to get started using a provider Adding version constraints Using multiple providers sharing the same name Using multiple versions of the same provider (spoiler: you can’t) Extra: configuring one provider binary multiple ways Downloading providers from places other than the public Registry Gist with example configs matching this article Conclusion & list of keywords Intro I’ve used Terraform regularly for a while now and decided to consolidate my knowledge by studying for the Terraform Associate Certification.
